Body: Competency in a language would be judged on ability to communicate ideas effectively. There are several areas one can look at for something like this, like if the speaker's phonology is the same as a native speaker, or if the speaker has a lexical command equivalent to a native speaker. Fluency could be looked at too, but one can be non-fluent in a language and still have near-native command of a language. This is because fluency is actually just referring to the ability of a speaker to speak at a constant rate without having to pause to think of vocabulary or how to phrase something grammatically.
